history.proof: split. - induction ll. + simpl. constructor. + simpl. constructor. * qsimpl. * apply IHll. qsimpl. - intros. induction ll. + constructor. + inversion H. subst. constructor. * apply H2. * apply IHll. apply H3.

exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type Y : Type f : X -> Y P : Y -> Prop a : X ll : list X IHll : Forall P (map f ll) -> Forall (fun x : X => P (f x)) ll H : Forall P (f a :: map f ll) Unable to unify "Forall P (f a :: map f ll)" with "P (f a)".
No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet *.

In environment X : Type Y : Type f : X -> Y P : Y -> Prop a : X ll : list X IHll : Forall P (map f ll) -> Forall (fun x : X => P (f x)) ll H : Forall P (f a :: map f ll) Unable to unify "Forall P (f a :: map f ll)" with "Forall P (map f ll)".
No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet -.

original: intros. split. - induction ll. + simpl. constructor. + simpl. constructor. * apply H. left. reflexivity. * apply IHll. intros. apply H. right. auto. - intros. induction ll. + simpl in H. constructor. + simpl in H. inversion H. subst. constructor. * apply H2. * apply IHll. apply H3.
